questions.question: Where can I find a token's smart contract?
questions.answer: Check CoinMarketCap, official project posts, or community announcements. The contract address is a long string like 0x2a...d9E1. Got the address? Select the right network and paste it into the bot.

questions.question: How do I check a token?
questions.answer: Press 'Check token', select the blockchain, and send the smart contract address.

questions.question: Which blockchains are supported?
questions.answer: Ethereum, Base, BNB Chain (BSC), and Solana. Choose the network where you plan to buy the token.

questions.question: How many free checks do I get?
questions.answer: You get 3 free token checks when you first use the bot. No subscription required. Need more? Upgrade to premium.

questions.question: What do the risk levels mean?
questions.answer: Tokens are scored from 1 to 100: Low (1‚Äì30), Medium (30‚Äì50), High (50‚Äì80), Very High (80‚Äì100). We check for honeypots, liquidity, owner permissions, and more.

questions.question: How do I pay for a subscription?
questions.answer: You can pay through Tribute ‚Äî it's fast, secure, and convenient. Crypto and fiat (credit cards) are both supported. Pay from any bank card or crypto wallet. Tribute is quick, secure, and works worldwide.
